title: Vyrindi, God of Battle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack three players each night ten thousand times.
- Choose another player. They win the game. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you kill a player, if they had to live to win, you may attack an additional player the next night.
- Whenever a player wins the game, your attack value permanently increases by a stage.
- While you're alive, you cannot lose the game and the game cannot end in your loss.

desc:
Post 2842
*The triumphant ruler of war. His glorious victory is imminent.*
Roleblock, redirect, conversion, and detection immune
